content:
You decide to offer your help and use your newfound balance and harmony to help the group. You approach the group and introduce yourself, they are happy to see you and they explain their situation to you. They tell you about their struggles and the challenges they are facing.

You listen to them and you can see that they are overwhelmed and lost. You start to share your own experiences and the lessons you have learned on your journey so far. You encourage them to take a step back, to reflect on their lives, and to identify what is important to them. You also encourage them to take action to regain balance in their lives, whether it's by setting boundaries, prioritizing self-care, or making changes in their relationships or career.

The group is grateful for your help and they start to make positive changes in their lives. They begin to feel a sense of balance and harmony that they haven't felt in a long time. They thank you for your help and they offer to join you on your journey.

You continue your journey with the group and you help them navigate their challenges and find balance and harmony in their lives. As you journey together, you share your experiences and you learn from each other.

Eventually, you reach the Tiferet, or beauty, which represents balance and harmony. You can see the lush jungle with towering trees and sparkling waterfalls. You realize that you have reached the next realm, and you have accomplished your task in this realm.

What would you like to do next?

A) Continue your journey to the next realm with the group
B) Take a moment to reflect on what you have learned and how it will affect your journey
C) Stay in the Tiferet and help more people find balance and harmony

Please pick one of the options above (A,B,C) to continue.
